## 2. Import lets-plot

```{python} 
from lets_plot import *

LetsPlot.setup_html()
```

## 4. Make a plot

```{python}
(
    ggplot(penguins, mapping = aes(x = 'flipper_length_mm', y = 'body_mass_g', colour = 'species')) + geom_point(shape = 15, alpha = 0.8) 
    + labs(
        title = 'Penguin body mass vs flipper length',
        x = 'Flipper length (mm)',
        y = 'Body mass (g)'
    ) 
    + theme_minimal()
)

```
